mutants.code:
def max_consistent_positive_sum(scores):
    last = 1
    best = 0
    for score in scores:
        last = max(last + score, score)
        best = max(best, last)
    return best if best > 0 else 0

def max_consistent_positive_sum(scores):
    last = -1
    best = 0
    for score in scores:
        last = max(last + score, score)
        best = max(best, last)
    return best if best > 0 else 0

    return best if best > 0 else 0
